lender.name: Bryan Green & Amy Peer
lender.loan_because: Christmas Gift 2007; I care for .people all
lender.occupational_info: I work with computer and enjoy many a quadcore! I teach kids how to be successful in their life!

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I have been very happy and fortunate all my life, and nothing makes me more happy than to help those in need.
lender.occupational_info: I am studying International Business at University

lender.name: Roger
lender.loan_because: I want to use some of our financial blessings to help others become self sufficient and more.

lender.name: Sophie and Ani
lender.loan_because: We want to help others have successful businesses. We feel lucky and blessed that we have the opportunity to help others. We received our first loan on Kiva as a gift for Christmas and we hope we help make a difference in others lives.
lender.occupational_info: We go to school in San Jose, California and are in the 5th and 3rd grade.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: It's a great idea to be able to help on a personal level. I've appreciated the encouragment I've received in my lifetime and it's good to give it back. We are all connected to each other in this world.

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: I wanted to find a good way to make a difference in the world.

lender.name: Sonia K
lender.loan_because: It's good to know that even a small loan can make a big difference to somebody in need. I especially support women's businesses because I believe that only the emancipation of women can promote real change and a better quality of life in poor communities and countries around the world.

lender.name: Barry
lender.loan_because: I want to improve the quality of life for people in developing countries.
lender.occupational_info: I help create images that inform people about the world around them.

lender.name: Mark & Rebecca
lender.loan_because: We want to see people get an opportunity to improve their quality of life.

lender.name: TOMMY B
lender.loan_because: IT IS A GOOD FEELING TO BE PART OF A PROCESS THAT WILL CHANGE LIVES!!!!
lender.occupational_info: I WORK WITH RADIOLOGISTS AS A SONOGRAPHER BY TAKING ULTRASOUND IMAGES OF DIFFERENT PARTS OF THE HUMAN BODY THAT WILL HELP THE RADIOLOGIST IN HIS REPORT TO THE PROVIDING PHYSICIANS GET TO A TREATMENT THERAPY FOR THE PATIENT.

lender.name: Joella
lender.loan_because: I want to give other women the chance to work and help better their family.
lender.occupational_info: assisting people to obtain passports in a quick fashion.

lender.name: ww and sis
lender.loan_because: "The time is always right to do what is right" Martin Luther King
lender.occupational_info: The photo is circa 1950 in Seattle when ww and sis were children. These days ww is retired and Sis waits for us with the angels.

lender.name: Carolyn
lender.loan_because: it's fun to help people who are motivated to help themselves so they will have a better life.
lender.occupational_info: I helped teachers to be better in the classroom so students could learn more.

lender.name: Melanie
lender.loan_because: I understand the struggle to make a living.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a medical device manufacturer. Currently, I am a part of a project team that is creating a global design for our SAP software system.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: everyone should when they can!
lender.occupational_info: I am an artist and teacher who cares about community.

lender.name: Karl
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of a group of dedicated people helping people to help people.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a not-for-profit organization that provides evaluation and analysis of learners to improving the teaching/learning process.

lender.name: Neal
lender.loan_because: I'm a Christian and this is a great way to make a difference in people's lives and to share the blessings the Lord has bestowed on me.
lender.occupational_info: Marketing and Business Developement for R-Jet Tek, an equipment and materials supplier for inkjet cartridge refilling businesses around the world.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: I wish to stimulate the world economy to distribute wealth more uniformly than our present system does. I wish to increase the success of small businesses

lender.name: Ross
lender.loan_because: I believe in the quote, "Do unto others and you would have them do unto you"
lender.occupational_info: Massage Therapist working with people who need pain relief. Worked as a Massage Therapist in 3 hospitals in San Francisco and volunteering with hospice.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: Giving makes my heart happy.
lender.occupational_info: I try to be the best mom I can so as to help ensure that my children are great human beings.

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: I want to help other women around the world achieve their goals.

lender.name: Tim and Josephina
lender.loan_because: we believe in People and their Power united.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a office that provides psychological service for people who care for others and even risk their lives!

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: I have traveled and have witnessed the devastation colonialism has caused in many countries. I want to be part of the grassroots effort to connect with our brothers and sisters to let them decide their own destiny.
lender.occupational_info: I work with wood to build housing.

lender.name: Kari and Jim
lender.occupation: High School Teacher and Park Ranger
lender.loan_because: Initially we were given a Kiva gift certificate to redeem. After exploring all the business plans we decided to expand and help more people in need.
lender.occupational_info: Kari teaches in a small high school grades 9-12 and the subjects vary depending upon the needs of the school. Jim is a park ranger who's job includes maintenance, construction projects, resource protection, and helping the public.

lender.name: Tom
lender.occupational_info: I am a university professor who teaches in the United States. I have also taught in Belgium and in Tanzania.

lender.name: Jasmine
lender.loan_because: It is unbelieveable that such a small loan can make such a big difference.
lender.occupational_info: I care for and prepare young children for school

lender.name: Sean
lender.loan_because: Jesus loves everyone.
lender.occupational_info: I am a senior studying Civil Engineering with an emphasis in water and environmental issues. I'd like to make my work/career useful...

lender.name: Louann, Greg & Olivia
lender.loan_because: We are fortunate enough to have extra money, so I wanted to put it to good use.
lender.occupational_info: I am a full time mother to my growing toddler. I handle all financial aspects of our family, manage all aspects of our household and take care of our 5 cats and 2 dogs as well. My husband is a Dentist for a growing Dental corporation. With partners we own eight offices and plan to acquire more. My husband is the only doctor at one of his offices, and he see's an average of 40 patients on a given day.

lender.name: Edward and Christy
lender.loan_because: We feel like it is a direct way to make life better for someone who's in need. I have the funds and certainly no better way to spend them. Especially in today's rough economic climate.
lender.occupational_info: Ed leads projects that deliver customer focused enterprise class solutions to the business I work for. Christy teaches kids to be the next the next generation of global citizens.

lender.name: Samantha
lender.loan_because: It is a great way to be able to help others globally and make a difference in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I work each day with 28 wonderful preps who always make me smile.

lender.name: Edith A.
lender.loan_because: I wish to help

lender.name: erik
lender.occupation: independent HR Business Partner and Advisor

lender.name: claire
lender.loan_because: i want to help. i am so fortunate and live in an abundant society. i never really considered how fortunate i am, but now, i can help others in need who live a more difficult life than i.
lender.occupational_info: i am a high school student in vancouver. i go to school, learn, play sports, grow, make new friends, and have fun. each day, my classmates and i learn 5 subjects, and each day, our subjects change. we move from class to class from mondays to fridays. i recently switched schools and now go to an all girls school. it is alot of work, but it all pays off because in the end, i have fun and gain knowledge.

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: There is a need.

lender.name: Lilajane
lender.loan_because: Because everyone has a right in the world to live.
lender.occupational_info: I am in 4th grade and I like to read, swim, climb trees and draw.

lender.name: Pam
lender.loan_because: I grew up in a family of seven children, my father died when he was 40. My mother raised us alone and I want to pay forward what others did for our family.
lender.occupational_info: I work making web sites for the internet.

lender.name: Kirsten
lender.loan_because: My family and I are very blessed, and we need to make a difference in the world.

lender.name: jessica
lender.loan_because: i want people to be able to succeed in there dreams

lender.name: Monica
lender.loan_because: How wonderful to be able to help others to help themselves - with whatever small contribution I can make!

lender.name: Duke
lender.loan_because: I believe in the ability of people to better their lives through hard work if provided with the opportunity and support from their community...in this case the world community.

lender.name: Harry
lender.loan_because: actions make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I am a ceramic artist and educator

lender.name: Bruce
lender.loan_because: " the purpose of business is to make money...the purpose of life is to do good".

lender.name: Mark Ashworth
lender.loan_because: Some business ideas just need to be given a chance and supported by others.
lender.occupational_info: I investigate technologies and help to determine whether they are good investments.

lender.name: Ruth
lender.loan_because: I love helping others and I would like to help the gals with their clothing sales, as I am a seamstress, too. I love the Lord and I will be praying for each one of you for success in you business and good health and happiness.
lender.occupational_info: I don't have a job, only what it takes to keep up the house and cook meals for me and my husband. We are retired from work.

lender.name: Randall & Carolyn
lender.loan_because: It feels good to help people to help themselves, and besides that I'm filthy rich.
lender.occupational_info: I install automatic meter readers on gas meters and Carolyn works for the phone company.

lender.name: Ashley
lender.loan_because: the state of the world would improve if we all made more socially minded decisions.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: The gift of giving ... it is what makes us human

lender.name: Sherri
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who are working hard to help themselves!

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: It is refreshing to see that with very little money, together, we can help people make a large difference in their lives and in their communities

lender.name: Denise
lender.loan_because: I'm blessed with enough of what I need, and doubly blessed that I have enough to share.

lender.name: Lynn
lender.loan_because: Junshien gave me 25 dollars for Christmas. Thanks.
lender.occupational_info: I love people. hehehe

lender.name: Joel
lender.loan_because: I am grateful when others help me, so I want to pass it on.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: the world can be a better place

lender.name: Margaret
lender.loan_because: If each of us can help just a little, the world will be stronger. Women supporting women. I am glad I live in a time to have that freedom. God has blessed me and my family.

lender.name: Caitlin
lender.occupational_info: Creating the sound and music for theatre.

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: I feel like it

lender.name: Josep Llus
lender.loan_because: I like to have the possibility to contribute to this projects with my daughter
lender.occupational_info: I am the publisher of a carrer guidance webside that helps people to take relevant decisions about their education

lender.name: Ken
lender.loan_because: It is time ,that the best of us should be helping the rest of us.
lender.occupational_info: Retired Vocational Instructor-Diesel Mechanics

lender.name: Misty
lender.loan_because: It helps me give back to a world that has given me so much.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of people who are ill and their families.

lender.name: Mario
lender.occupation: very busy loving my wife and my daughter...
lender.loan_because: I am a lucky man. I born in a good place, from a great family, in the right century... Helping through Kiva is just a little little thing I feel right to do.

lender.name: alice
lender.loan_because: I think It's the least people in richer countries can do to help and support those less fortunate. I rather help a mother buying her children an education or food, than buy myself another pair of too expensive jeans.
lender.occupational_info: I check people from all over the world in on flights from Amsterdam. Before doing so I was a flight attendant and visited many countries all over the world.

lender.name: Cindy
lender.loan_because: This is such an effortless way to change the world. For the price of a pretty inexpensive dinner out, I can give someone across the globe a change to feed themselves and their family in the future.
lender.occupational_info: I read Leases for parcels of commercial real estate, re-write them in ways that are easier to understand, and then sort out who owes who money each month.

lender.name: Belinda
lender.loan_because: This sounded like a great way to help people and I decided to do on to others how I want others to treat me. I would love help if I needed it!
lender.occupational_info: I make films and documentaries about people lives and events that happen in their lives. I want to educate the world.

lender.name: Weegie
lender.loan_because: I believe strongly in the power of the will to thrive and succeed. I wish you all great success in your ventures!

lender.name: Heidi
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in this world.

lender.name: John and Family
lender.loan_because: I want to do something that might really help someone.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a warehouse and I process orders for a medical supply company. This means that I actually have to go into the warehouse and find the products wich are being ordered and then put them on pallets and wrap them, so they can be ready for delivery.

lender.name: Christophe
lender.loan_because: it makes me happy.
lender.occupational_info: We are developping a photovoltaic car shelter and I am providing advises to save energy.

lender.name: Phyllis
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Ellen
lender.loan_because: This money was a Christmas gift from my daughter and I would like to help make a difference in the world
lender.occupational_info: I fly all over the world taking people going on holiday or to play a sport or to take care of sick people also to take or bring home troops who help to keep us safe.

lender.name: Tore Martin
lender.loan_because: I live in Norway and we have too much. I want to be solidary with people who don`t have so much

lender.name: Leena
lender.loan_because: I'm worth it.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because:
It's a rewarding experience for both parties !!
My reward is that i get enormous satisfaction knowing that with such a small financial contribution, I can help a fellow entrepreneur change their lives for the better immediately!! That's a great feeling !!
lender.occupational_info: We are a fraud mitigation company, we combat fraud in SBA and Residential Mortgage loans via www.e-taxrecords.com our income verification services through the IRS .

lender.name: Henry
lender.loan_because: The idea is simple and effective.
lender.occupational_info: Most of the time, I'm waiting for these slow bipeds. How do you get around with only 2 legs? Shouldn't you fall over?

lender.name: Rhonda
lender.loan_because: "You make a living by what you get. You make a life by what you give." (Winston Churchill)

lender.name: Bobby
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: Sometimes people need a hand up, not a hand out.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: entrepreneur in safety.

lender.name: Peter Bergmark
lender.loan_because: It's a great idea in order to directly help people in need. And a wonderful feeling to be part of a maybe lifechanging experience in peoples lifes.

lender.name: Mark and Myrna
lender.loan_because: we want to give opportunities to others as others have given to us.
lender.occupational_info: Giving medical care and writing books that we hope will make people healthier and happier in their daily lives

lender.name: Tamara & Jeffrey
lender.loan_because: I am extremely blessed to live in the United States where we have a variety of options to open a small business. I want to help give someone that same opportunity and dream.
lender.occupational_info: I am a real estate agent which means I help people buy and sell their homes. My husband owns a home remodeling business. You can learn more about it at www.JJVHI.com

lender.name: Nikki
lender.loan_because: I want to help, but I do not have much extra money. This little bit of money will go unnoticed in my life, but will make the difference in someone else's.

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: I want to see developing nations become more self-sufficient and provide their citizens with more economic opportunities.
lender.occupational_info: I teach students at college who are18 to 22 about comparative government and international law.

lender.name: Rick
lender.loan_because: entrepreneurship and having a successful small business provide meaning to the lives of many people, both providing a service and receiving services and products
lender.occupational_info: I am a small business consultant and coach. I help business owners and their management team develop leadership skills and grow their business.

lender.name: Justine & David
lender.loan_because: We are very fortunate and have 'enough'. I want other people to feel this content and happy and safe. When people come together like this, great things really do happen! A big thanks to my mom for exposing me to Kiva. Love you, Mom!
lender.occupational_info: I work on bringing medicines into the world to the patients who need them. David works at a rubber plant making all kinds of hoses and parts for local businesses.

lender.name: marie
lender.loan_because: its fun giving !
lender.occupational_info: I teach student in design, jewellry and packaging design. But most of the time i just love them and share their future dreams!

lender.name: Hana
lender.loan_because: I believe in a better world.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a nonprofit medical organization that provides medical care in settings of extreme poverty around the world. My job involves researching papers, helping prepare documents, designing graphics, and translating.

lender.name: Shanaaz
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Oscar MG
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Gina
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do

lender.name: Randolph
lender.loan_because: This method of helping people around the world is revolutionary. It show god (humble) human beings can help one another. It causes him to help us in return.
lender.occupational_info: I help people with disabilities. I make comfortable homes for them to live in.

lender.name: Henrik
lender.loan_because: One person at the time, we can change the world
lender.occupational_info: Bachelor of Science in Biomedical Laboratory Science

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: It feels wonderful to help empower people to make substantial changes in their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I like to work in the garden growing food and making things more beautiful.

lender.name: Dorie
lender.loan_because: . Microfinance is such a simple and efffective concept. It allows me in a very small way to feel connected to the world.
lender.occupational_info: I volunteer with several different organizations.

lender.name: Pat
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of everyday citizens redistributing wealth. The creators of Kiva.org deserve the Nobel Peace Prize.

lender.name: Tommee
lender.loan_because: people have helped me before, now I like to help someone else
lender.occupational_info: I clean offices and classrooms at a large university in the USA

lender.name: Luis
lender.loan_because: Why not ?
lender.occupational_info: bits and bytes..............

lender.name: Katherine
lender.loan_because: I want to help people in poor countries.
lender.occupational_info: I'm in grade 6 and almost 12 years old.

lender.name: Derek
lender.loan_because: I want to effect as much positive change in the world as possible, both domestically and abroad.
lender.occupational_info: I want to help you start or grow your business by lending you some money.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: It's easy!
lender.occupational_info: I make people feel at home, away from home.

lender.name: Kristoffer
lender.loan_because: i want to make the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: i am a student, so i spend my time at the univercity studying books, like math, science and other subjects i need to know to become a engineer

lender.name: Burton Family
lender.loan_because: It is important to give back by giving to those that have not had the same opportunities that we have had and are trying to improve their lives through hard work.
lender.occupational_info: We are a family of 4.

lender.name: Sharon
lender.loan_because: No one got to where they are without having had stepped on the backs of others.
lender.occupational_info: I write and edit health articles for Shape magazine (www.shape.com). I'm also a volunteer editor for Kiva.org.

lender.name: Lauren
lender.loan_because: it is important for me to help others in need.

lender.name: Dr. Kendra Zamzow
lender.loan_because: I believe in people helping people
lender.occupational_info: Help citizen's groups and indigenous people understand the potential impacts of a mine that is in, or coming to, their area. Particularly impacts of mining on water.

lender.name: Richard & Sherry
lender.loan_because: We can, and a little help can go a long way.

lender.name: Iris
lender.loan_because: If i can help a women in need theare are so many women that support their families and women are the rocks in wich the house is build if their is no women in the family their is no family.
lender.occupational_info: i work in a office doing many thing like paper work and cd dupplication for a very large company.

lender.name: Sharon
lender.loan_because: I want to help people improve their lives and the lives of those around them.
lender.occupational_info: I am a doctor who cares for older people.

lender.name: anita
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed to be a blessing to others.
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired teacher and principal and now I work for the University of Regina in Regina, Saskatchewan, Canada coordinating and teaching in a Masters of Education program.

lender.name: Judy
lender.loan_because: It will make the world a better place for women and children.
lender.occupational_info: I'm an elected official for a County in the state of Oregon.

lender.name: karsten
lender.loan_because: I want to see how it works.
lender.occupational_info: Currently retired. Just trying to get something going,

lender.name: Charles
lender.loan_because: Education, the value of work, and achieving a sense of self sufficiency puts humanity on the path to true freedom.

lender.name: Pete
lender.loan_because: Together we can make a real difference for people who otherwise might have difficulty raising money. I like the idea of loaning to a concrete individual, rather than an amorphous organisation where I have no feedback on the use to which the money is put.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: people have helped me in the past
lender.occupational_info: we preserve wedding flowers

lender.name: Mike L
lender.loan_because: I've been happy because others have believed in me. I want my grandchildren to understand that people everywhere are the same - we all need help from time to time.
lender.occupational_info: I have a company that builds shade structures

lender.name: Manitoba
lender.loan_because: I have a very good life so I want to provide an opportunity to succeed, to someone who is resourceful enough to deserve it. This is a great chance to give back to a world that has been very kind to me. I just think that this is a very good alternative to receiving gifts that we have no need for and a great conduit for giving support to those who do need.
lender.occupational_info: I try to work hard. I love to play hard I love all 4 seasons (one of them is a bit too long). I kayak every chance I get. And most of all - I just love life!!

lender.name: Valine
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.

lender.name: Rodger
lender.loan_because: To believe I can help those less fortunate accomplish their goals is very rewarding to me

lender.name: Ernie & Yvonne
lender.loan_because: My son-in-law signed me up as a Christmas present.
lender.occupational_info: A Probation Officer works with the Judge at Court and the Police to supervise those that are in trouble with the law and are not currently in jail.

lender.name: Bridget
lender.loan_because: people have helped me achieve my dreams and I want to "pay it forward" by helping other ambitious business-minded people.

lender.name: Cole
lender.loan_because: I am a Christian, and that is what a Christian does...or should do.
lender.occupational_info: Really fun, and a big commitment

lender.name: Danielle
lender.loan_because: This was a gift from someone who knew that this would be the perfect thing to give me. This opportunity allows me to help fund a wonderful, empowering project and that puts a smile on my face!

lender.name: Nan
lender.loan_because: It feels good to help those who are working to help themselves, their families and their communities.
lender.occupational_info: I am an environmentalist and champion of eco-friendly building.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: "Show me your achievement - and the knowledge will give me courage for mine." ('The Fountainhead' 1946)

lender.name: linet Njenga
lender.loan_because: I think it feels realy good to know that you have made a difference in someone's life with just a small contribution. When growing up, we hardly had enough money for food and clothes, my mom worked realy hard to get me where i am today. Now that i have a little extra i can give it back to someone in need. My family was once the people im helping today, only no one was there to lend us any money.

lender.name: Joe, Michele & Kids
lender.loan_because: a hand-up is better than a hand-out!

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I'd like to help out. Good luck.
lender.occupational_info: I provide support for attorneys.

lender.name: paul
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: I like to make things so I often work in the building trades but for the last decade I've been working in the world of software relative to the manufacturing industry. Getting ready to change tracks again though.

lender.name: Susan&Chuck
lender.loan_because: We have travelled and lived around the world most of our lives and understand how lucky we are. We're not wealthy but we are human beings and would much prefer to invest in people than in stock markets.
lender.occupational_info: I help people to market their goods or services and play with clay on the side...;-)

lender.name: Stber
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of being able to turn my $25 dollars into maybe hundreds of dollar of microloans over time.
lender.occupational_info: I work at an organic/free trade coffee shop called AMT.

lender.name: Ginny
lender.loan_because: we should, " Never doubt that a small, group of thoughtful, committed citizens can change the world. Indeed, it is the only thing that ever has."

lender.name: Ronald
lender.loan_because: Seeding in the dreams of others is a great reward. It is our hope to grow communities through private investments, and get the resources direct to the need.
lender.occupational_info: Work in the banking and investment community. We have been in financial market and communications for over 26 years,

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: I would like to make a difference in helping people improve their livelihoods.
lender.occupational_info: I create maps and work with geographic data for a municipal government.

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: This is much better than losing money in the stock market.
lender.occupational_info: Business analyst / spreadsheet jockey

lender.name: Joseph L. Harris
lender.loan_because: I want to share what I have to help others help themselves and their communities.

lender.name: C Wagner
lender.loan_because: It's sustainable giving.

lender.name: Carol Beth
lender.loan_because: It is a small way to touch someone in another part of the world who needs assistance.
lender.occupational_info: I love to paint to bring light and smiles into peoples lives. You may not recognize any particular object in my work, but hopefully you will feel the love in my heart coming through the color, gestures and lines.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: Traditional development assistance to the Third World has been a failure, by and large. Microfinance is a way to enable people to improve their standard of living, while taking responsibility for their actions. I like the personal connection and the ability to see that the money I lend is making a difference.
lender.occupational_info: Before my retirement, I was a senior manager in a management consulting firm specialized in performance management, particularly activity-based management. Our clients were businesses and governments.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: Every time I wish someone would lend me some money because I am poor, I remember that there are people who need it more.
lender.occupational_info: I work with lawyers to prove our cases using behavioral science.

lender.name: Elise
lender.loan_because: I work and have worked in countries all around the world. In doing so I have seen the most disgusting of abject poverty and the failures of the human spirit. I loan because I see kiva as one of the triumphs of the human spirit.
lender.occupational_info: i am currently studying rural development in a masters programme, hoping eventually to work in food policy, agricultural development, fair trade networks etc.

lender.name: Kristin
lender.loan_because: My daughter gave me a gift certificate for Christmas. What a wonderful gift, becuase it's the gift of giving and I can pass it on to others.
lender.occupational_info: I teach English to adults who speak other first languages.

lender.name: Diana
lender.loan_because: It connects me to heart energy.
lender.occupational_info:
As a research assistant, my work is primarily administrative: I work in a department of the University of Kansas that is committed to improving the developmental, social and academic lives of children.
As a yoga instructor I strive to create a supportive, nurturing enviornment for students to practice mindfulness with the use of their breath and movement through postures.

lender.name: Vivian
lender.loan_because: I believe all people should be empowered to help thier families and have the basic resources to provide an education for their children

lender.name: Debbie
lender.loan_because: it feels great and everyone deserves opportunity!

lender.name: Tammy
lender.loan_because: I love to support people who are willing to work to find a way to enrich their lives and vision that will change their community .
lender.occupational_info: I am commited to a world where people have the freedom to choose how they live their lives.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I believe we are one human family.
lender.occupational_info: I offer leadership in a Christian Church.

lender.name: Henning & Hanne
lender.occupation: Henning sells fish and Hanne is an art guide

lender.name: Wayne
lender.loan_because: We all can make a difference in one another's lives.

lender.name: Luc
lender.occupational_info: I teach French to children in the elementary grades. Most of my students are 8 years old.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: it makes sense to me
lender.occupational_info: I teach teenagers to speak Spanish.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I want to help. It is another step toward peace and equality.

lender.name: Bob
lender.loan_because: I believe that small businesses are the engine that drives economies and I like the idea of being able to help people help themselves. I am also available to provide any needed help in planning a business and putting together business plans.
lender.occupational_info: I am an engineer that has spent most of my career in manufacturing and operations from setting up manufacturing facilities to running corporations. I am currently retired although I do some management consulting. I am an avid amateur photographer.

lender.name: RevolutionSocks.com
lender.loan_because: we lend $1 for every pair of socks we sell using the 'kiva' coupon code plus you receive free shipping!
lender.occupational_info: Solving the problem of one black sock in your sock drawer! We provide Canada's most comfortable men's dress sock.

lender.name: Craig & Ginger
lender.occupational_info: I work in an emergency room with 50 beds. We see about 250-280 patients a day.

lender.name:
David
Santa Monica
lender.loan_because: Everyone Should

lender.name: Mahmood (Mike)
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: David & Deborah
lender.loan_because:
"The fact that we can't solve all the problems of the world does not absolve us of the responsibility of solving the ones we can." Bob Macauley, Founder & Chairman of Americares.
"How wonderful it is that nobody need wait a single moment before starting to improve the world." Anne Frank.
lender.occupational_info: David is an accountant specializing in reporting and compliance for not-for-profit organizations. Deborah is a medical transcriptionist.

lender.name: Neil
lender.loan_because: I believe in entrepreneurship.

lender.name: Highwood
lender.loan_because: I want to be part of the solution.

lender.name: Chains For Change
lender.loan_because:
As Ghandi brilliantly said, I too truly believe everyone should be the change that they wish to see in the world and Kiva has provided me and others the opportunity to do so, together, in a global effort. The change I see is the movement away from thinking and benefiting in terms of personal gains to a more widespread outlook that focuses on building stronger economic principals on the global level. This could eventually better the lives of men, women, children, and even the environment, and not just in the few most lucrative areas of the world. Expensive in the short-run? probably. Beneficial for all in the long-run? Definitely.
I am a global studies major and often feel overwhelmed by the things I learn, and the desire to solve, well at least contribute to the resolve of, all of our global problems, which I have stubbornly come to realize is impossible. So thank you, Kiva, for giving even the simplest of students the ability to begin to see and contribute to her idea of change.
lender.occupational_info: My mom and I make key chains in our free time and sell them. Each key chain comes with an explanation about Kiva and the website so they can go online and check it out. We invest the money we make from the sales to Kiva and the small businesses it helps. We wanted to help others become involved in something we felt was making a difference and we hope that our key chains can help spread the word for many years to come. *We are proud to announce we have earned over $275 dollars with the sale of our key chains as well as other generous donations by people who simply wanted to help!*

lender.name: peter
lender.loan_because: I feel I am truly helping someone directly and I like that. People who have a plan and work hard to achieve it deserve all the help the world can give them and more. Good luck to all!
lender.occupational_info: I am extremely fortunate because I love to play music and I make a decent living at it.

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: A small commitment on my part can make a huge difference to someone else.

lender.name: Assunta
lender.loan_because: I find kiva.org a wonderful way to help people overseas in a direct way - in countries where I know help is needed. I do it in the name of my little grand daughter Adeline

lender.name: Karin
lender.loan_because: I think it's important for us in the industrialized world to care for those less privilaged. It is very inspiring to be able to help someone make a better life for themselves, and possibly fulfill their lifelong dreams!
lender.occupational_info: I am working with sales and specilize in key accounts within Facilities Management.

lender.name: Ken
lender.loan_because: I think this is an awesome opportunity to make a direct difference in somone's life. I enjoy the idea that I helped someone by loaning them money for a sewing machine, or to purchase sheep.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a large computer company where we help customers with the software they purchase from us. I manage a team of people that provide their knowledge and expertise to our clients.

lender.name: Steven
lender.occupational_info: Currently, I am in high school. Shortly, I will be going to college somewhere in the United States.

lender.name: Sandy Paquin
lender.loan_because: I want people to have rewarding lives.
lender.occupational_info: Logistics. I hope the people I loan to have fulfilling and happy careers,

lender.name: Catherine
lender.loan_because: I want to help people around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I am an advertising student currently interning.

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: I feel the entrepreneurs of the world all need a little seed money.
lender.occupational_info: My occupation is corporate finance which means I lend money to large multi-national corporations. These companies were founded by entrepreneurs and it would be great to see someone turn a Kiva loan into a large corporation some day.

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I am a self employed (contractor) Internet Application developer.

lender.name: Grace
lender.loan_because: It feels good to be fortunate enough to help other people start or improve their business.
lender.occupational_info: Saving Grace Designs (design jewelry)

lender.name: Family
lender.loan_because: We wanted to do something charitable as a family. But here is an amazing system that is helpful to those already motivated; I hope these entrepreneurs will spread the word.

lender.name: Rishi
lender.loan_because: I believe in free markets, entrepreneurship and the spirit of capitalism - and that everyone should be given an opportunity!
lender.occupational_info: I work for a big financial services firm helping build a business to trade capital electronically thru stock exchanges around the world.

lender.name: Gerald & Suzanne
lender.loan_because: God has blessed us, and we want to bless others.

lender.name: Donna R.
lender.loan_because: My niece got me started. This is such an easy way to reach across the world and give someone the help they need to make a better life for themselves.

lender.name: Daniel & Iris
lender.loan_because: We hope to give a chance for a proper start for different business with some capital. And we will be proud to hear from our "business partners" when they successfully manage their company.
lender.occupational_info: We both work for a global bank in wealth management resp. human resources.

lender.name: Bob & Lynn
lender.loan_because: We hope our support will help others make a better life for themselves and their families.

lender.name: one
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping those who want to help themselves. I feel that hard-working people all around the world who might be less fortunate deserve a helping hand from those of us more fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: I design building structures.

lender.name: Molly
lender.loan_because: I want to help people.
lender.occupational_info: I am studying to become a teacher or doctor. I am a vegetarian and l love to read and write. This photo is me and my brother Samuel.

lender.name: Aaron
lender.loan_because: I'm happy to help those who are willing to help themselves - they just need money to get started.
lender.occupational_info: I design and build software for health insurance companies.

lender.name: Priscilla
lender.loan_because: it makes sense.

lender.name: Duncan
lender.loan_because: I can. I see being born in Canada as tantamount to winning the birth lottery, and I think that with that comes a responsibility to help others in this global village that we share.
lender.occupational_info: I work in communications - public relations, crisis communications - helping clients effectively get their messages to the people who need to hear them.

lender.name: Cassandra
lender.loan_because: the simplest act can change someone's life. Knowing that I can help someone somewhere around the world makes me realize how fortunate i am.

lender.name: Carin
lender.loan_because: I am truly impressed with an organization that finds effective means of getting funds directly from donors to entrepreneurs. It is wonderful to be part of a global movement that both believes in changing the world for the better and finds a mechanism to do just that!
lender.occupational_info: I work in the areas of national innovation policies and international business. I am extremely interested in the ways in which business can adjust some of the serious inequities in the world and how wealthier nations can contribute to the well-being of people in less wealthy countries.

lender.name: Helen Murray
lender.occupational_info: I teach 4 year old children.

lender.name: Leslie
lender.loan_because: I enjoy feeling the connection to those who are trying to build a better life for themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I have my own business, selling high fashion jewelry in direct sales

lender.name: MATA 7
lender.loan_because: I care
lender.occupational_info: Great and productive

lender.name: Samantha & Scott
lender.loan_because: Money is like manure; it's not worth a thing unless it's spread around encouraging young things to grow.
lender.occupational_info: We develop strategic plans to advance our company's mission and objectives and to promote revenue, profitability, and growth as an organization. We also oversee company operations to insure production efficiency, quality, service, and cost-effective management of resources.

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: I feel fortunate to be able to share with those who need help.
lender.occupational_info: I am a teacher of children with special needs.

lender.name: Alana
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Kat
lender.loan_because: I believe individuals giving to individuals is much more effective than macro loans at a government level.
lender.occupational_info: I manage a yarn store, we sell knitting and crochet supplies to people.

lender.name: Debra
lender.loan_because: I am thrilled to be supporting a more sustainable world through entreprenuerial efforts.
lender.occupational_info: I work with executives and business owners looking for innovative ways to take their business or careers to the next level.

lender.name: Marty
lender.loan_because: I like knowing how my loans impacts someone's life.

lender.name: Elaine
lender.loan_because: I think it is a really neat idea.
lender.occupational_info: Secretarial to a Vice President of Finance in a University.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: I want to make a positive difference in people's lives.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a therapist for underprivilidged Native American children.

lender.name: Ken and Joyce
lender.loan_because: The work of this organization fits with our conservative ideals...giving a hand up, not a handout. In our view, the people at Kiva are modern-day heroes.
lender.occupational_info: Ken:Trucking Joyce:Academia

lender.name: Janet
lender.loan_because: I am blessed with more than enough and there are far too many who do not have even the bare necessities.
lender.occupational_info: Empowering others in life.

lender.name: Rory
lender.loan_because: Sad though it may seem, people are likely to allocate borrowed money 100 times more intelligently than donated money.
lender.occupational_info: I write advertisements for things.

lender.name: Doug and Emily
lender.loan_because: We have both been blessed by generous people in our lives. This gives us a chance to give back to people in need.
lender.occupational_info: College students

lender.name: Teresa
lender.loan_because: I think microloans are a brilliant way to support people who want to improve their lives for the better but lack the funds to do so.
lender.occupational_info: I draw pictures or make animations to help explain medical or scientific concepts.

lender.name: Bob
lender.loan_because: it helps people improve their lives and become independent.
lender.occupational_info: I design and build integrated audio and video systems.

lender.name: Carolyn
lender.loan_because: I'd heard about microloans and thought it was a great idea, but didn't know how to do it. My sister-in-law sent us gift certificates to Kiva to get us started, and it's just snowballed from there!
lender.occupational_info: Basic cognitive psychology experiments: write computer programs, analyze data, write journal articles, conduct experiments.

lender.name: Tracy
lender.loan_because: to try to make a difference, a little bit at a time

lender.name: Alasdair
lender.loan_because: I heard about Kiva on the radio and liked what I heard. I joined Kiva right away because it is good to help people directly.
lender.occupational_info: I live and work in far northern Canada. I am a government biologist and I work with many kinds of wild animals. We do this to make sure that the animals will be here in the future and because local people here depend on them for food and income. It is very good work and I've been doing it for a long time.

lender.name: Tyler
lender.loan_because: it's great to be able to help someone.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student in the tenth grade at Heritage Christian Academy in Maple Grove, MN (www.heritageweb.org). I've been to Jinotepe, Nicaragua on a mission trip and hope to return soon.

lender.name: Peggy
lender.loan_because: I want to help people willing to help themselves.

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: I too am a small business owner. I want to support other small businesses.
lender.occupational_info: I help people with personal problems, and I make paintings of the things in the world that interest me.

lender.name: david
lender.loan_because: I appreciate people's efforts to improve their lives and their surroundings.
lender.occupational_info: I write computer code for the government.
